verses.text: MONŪ‘IA Ā ka ko e toko taha. Kuo fakamolemole ‘ene talangata‘a, Kuo ‘ufi‘ufi ‘ene faihala.
Monū‘ia ā ka ko e tangata ‘Oku ‘ikai lau hia ki ai ‘e Sihova, Pea ‘i hono laumālie ‘oku ‘ikai ha kākā.
Lolotonga ‘eku fakalongo pē, Ko hoku ngaahi hui na‘e ‘aufoe, Pea ‘osi ‘a e ‘aho mo ‘eku to‘e.
He ko e ‘aho mo e pō na‘e mamafa mai ho nima: Na‘a ku mahahu‘a hangē ha me‘a ‘i he la‘ala‘ā. (Sila)

Na‘a ku fakamo‘oni ki he ‘Afiona ‘eku hia, Pea na‘e ‘ikai te u fufū ‘eku angahala: Na‘a ku pehē, Te u vete ki he ‘Eiki ‘eku ngaahi talangata‘a; Pea na‘a ke tāmate‘i ‘a e mo‘ua ‘o ‘eku angahala. (Sila)
Ko ia ai, ko e kau lotu fua pē Te nau hū ki he ‘Afiona ha taimi ta‘imālie: Tala atu ka fā ‘ani vai kāfakafa, ‘E ‘ikai tatae kiate ia.
Ko koe hoku toitoi‘anga; Te ke lehilehi‘i au mei he ‘efihia; Te ke tuku ke ongo mai takatakai ‘a e mavava fakahaofi. (Sila)
Te u akonaki‘i koe mo hulu ki he hala te ke foua: Te u fale‘i koe ‘aki ‘eku hila.
‘Oua te ke hangē ko e hoosi pe miuli, ‘Oku ‘ikai hanau ‘atamai; ‘Oku teu ‘aki ‘a e piti mo e no‘o ke puke, Na‘a ‘ikai fie ofi kia koe.
‘Oku lahi ‘a e ngaahi mamahi ongo ‘e hoko ki he talangata‘a: Ka ko ia ‘oku falala ki he ‘Eiki ‘e kāpui ia ‘e he ‘ofa.
Mou fiefia ‘i he ‘Eiki ‘a e kau mā‘oni‘oni, pea hākahaka; ‘Io, mou mavava kotoa ‘a e kau loto totonua.
